Gently drop the chicken tenders into the hot peanut oil for 10 minutes. Then carefully take the chicken out to let it drain.
Quickly sprinkle the dosed kief chili mixture over the chicken tenders while they are hot. Serve while hot and enjoy!

title: Latkes
description: Cannabis, potatoes, and tradition. Just make sure you use Kosher Kush.
directions: Using a double boiler, heat the vegetable oil until it simmers.Add the ground cannabis, and simmer for 60 minutes over low heat, stirring often.

Meanwhile, finely shred the potatoes. Keep the shredded potatoes from turning grey by immersing them in water. When all the potatoes have been grated and you are ready to use them, drain them thoroughly. Grate the onions and set aside.
Preheat oven to 250º F and place a baking sheet inside.
When the cannabis-infused vegetable oil is ready, strain the fiber out (with cheesecloth) and reserve the oil.
Drain the potatoes and press them against the colander to squeeze all the water out.

Mix the grated potatoes and onions in a large bowl. Add the eggs, salt and pepper. Mix well to combine. Add the flour and mix again.

(note) - You may need to add a little more flour if the mixture seems too loose.

Heat ½ cup of the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat.

(note) - Test the oil by dropping a tsp of the latke batter into the pan; if it turns brown within one minute, then the oil is ready.
Make your latkes by frying one heaping tbsp of batter, until golden brown on each side.
Transfer the latkes on a bed of rice or couscous to help catch the excess cannabis-infused oil.
After the excess oil is drained off each latkes, transfer it to the oven to keep warm on the baking sheet. Repeat this process in batches until all the latke batter is used up.
Reserve any remaining oil for another purpose.
Serve latkes with sour cream and applesauce.

title: Mai Tai
description: Send out tropical vibes with this cool take on a classic cocktail.
directions: Preheat oven to 240° F and grind up cannabis.
Spread ground cannabis over a lined baking tray and bake for about 30-45 minutes.

After taking your cannabis out of the oven, let it cool down and put it in a large Mason jar, together with the rum. Shake it well and keep doing this every now and then while leaving it in a dark area for 5-7 days.

(note) - The longer the mix stays in the jar, the more tasty and potent it will become.
Add pineapple juice, orange Curaçao, orgeat, and simple syrup to a glass of cannabis-infused rum. Fill with chunks of ice and shake or stir vigorously.
Serve immediately.

title: Mango Breeze
description: The ideal drink to enjoy on a hot summer day.
directions: Preheat oven to 240° F.
Grind up cannabis and place into small ovenproof bowl. Cover the bowl with foil and put it in the oven for 35 minutes.

Once the cannabis has finished the decarboxylation process, transfer it to a small container and pour in some vodka until the cannabis is covered and soaked. Cover the container and store it in the fridge for 24 hours (up to 7 days) to infuse the vodka.

(note) - The longer the mix stays in the container, the more potent it will become.
Strain the cannabis-vodka mix into a blender using cheesecloth and discard the plant matter.
Add the mango chunks, cranberry juice, and orange juice to the blender with the crushed ice, then slice the lemon and squeeze out the juice. Blend the ingredients until smooth.
Serve in a glass with ice.

title: Maple Syrup
description: Canadians are known for their maple syrup, but it has always been missing something …
directions: Heat the oven to 250° F.Grind up cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

Bake the cannabis for 35-40 minutes, taking care not to let the cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.
Set up a double boiler by placing a heat-resistant bowl over a pot of boiling water and pour the maple syrup into the bowl to heat up until it`s at 160°F.
Grab the cannabis from the oven, transfer it onto a cheesecloth and tie it up into a bundle.
Submerge the cheesecloth bundle into the heated syrup for 1-2 hours then remove the syrup from the heat, squeeze out the cheesecloth and allow the CannaSyrup to cool.

title: Margarita
description: Enjoy the intense flavor of CannaTequila in this traditional margarita.
directions: Shake all ingredients together.
Muddle.
Strain over ice into a collins glass and garnish with lime peel.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Warm flaky cannabis-infused pizza dough topped with classic tomato sauce and creamy mozzarella cheese.
directions: Preheat oven to 400° F.
Place all the dry ingredients in the bowl and mix together with your fingers. Then make a divot in the top.
Pour the 2 tbsp of cannabis-infused olive oil into the divot.
Mix in enough warm water to make a dough. There is no set amount of water, just start with a small amount and work your way up.

The dough is done when it easily comes away from the sides of the bowl.

(note) - If the dough is too wet, add CannaFlour and mix thoroughly until it comes away from the bowl. If it is too dry, add very small amounts of water until the desired texture is reached.
Put some CannaFlour on your hands and briefly knead the dough. The dough should be just a bit sticky.
Cover the bowl with the plate and set aside in a warm place for at least 60 minutes.
Lightly oil the pizza tray.
Turn out the dough onto the tray and press out evenly to the edges.
Spread tomato sauce until even all over.
Divide the mozzarella evenly over the sauce.
Add the toppings of your choice.
Bake the pizza for 25-30 minutes.
Once the cheese is golden brown, remove the pizza from the oven and place it on a rack to cool. Cut into slabs.
Serve while hot and enjoy.

title: Mary Jane Mojito
description: There is nothing more refreshing on a hot summer day than an ice cold cannabis-infused mojito.
directions: Mix the ground cannabis and mint together in a small glass.
Squeeze a lime wedge into the mixture, add the sugar, ice, rum, club soda, and mix.
Garnish with a lime wedge and drink immediately.

title: Mini Yogurt Cheesecakes
description: Homemade cannabis-infused crust with a creamy cannabis-infused cheesecake filling, topped with sweet pomegranate sauce.
directions: Preheat the oven to 375° F.Lightly grease two muffin tins.
In the bowl of a food processor, pulse the graham crackers until they are finely ground. Transfer to a medium bowl and then wipe out the food processor`s bowl.
Add the salt to the graham cracker crumbs and stir to combine. Add the melted CannaButter and stir until the crumbs are evenly moistened.
Scoop 2 tbsp of crumbs into a muffin cup and press to form an even layer in the base. Repeat with the remaining crumbs in the remaining muffin cups.
Bake the crust for 4-5 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden. Let the crust cool to room temperature.
Lower the oven temperature to 325°F.
In the bowl of the food processor, combine the yogurt with the cream cheese and CannaSugar and process until smooth, 1-2 minutes.
Add the eggs, vanilla extract, cinnamon and salt, and continue to process until the batter is smooth and combined, about 1 minute more.
Scoop ⅓ cup cheesecake filling onto each cooled crust. Bake until the custard is lightly golden and set at the edges but still slightly jiggly in the center, 15-20 minutes.
Cool completely and then remove the cheesecakes from the muffin tins and refrigerate until firm, at least 30 minutes. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
For the sauce, in a bowl, toss the pomegranate seeds with the pomegranate molasses (if using).
To serve, spoon 1 tbsp of the pomegranate mixture on top of each cheesecake.

title: Mulled Cider
description: Apple cider mixed with the sweet taste of brown sugar, cinnamon, and citrus. This cider is then spiced up with the addition of bourbon and cannabis.
directions: Add the cider, juice, spices, sugar and peel to a medium saucepan and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 30 minutes to blend flavors.
Using cheesecloth, strain the cider to remove the whole spices and other leftover plant material. Add the tincture and the alcohol.

Divide into four mugs and serve immediately.

(optional) - Add additional doses of the cannabis tincture or alcohol deepening of individual preference.

title: Mushroom & Blue Cheese Risotto
description: Fresh mushrooms and garlic with creamy blue cheese, infused with CannaButter.
directions: Heat olive oil a large skillet over medium high heat.Add the arborio rice and stir with the oil for 1-2 minutes, or until toasted.
Add the shallot and garlic and sauté for another minute. Add the mushrooms and sauté until softened, about 3 minutes.
Add vermouth or white wine and stir to deglaze the pan.
Add 1 cup of chicken stock and stir. When most of the liquid has been absorbed, add another cup. Repeat the process cooking for about 20 minutes total.
Stir in CannaButter with the last of the liquid and cook until just absorbed.
Remove from heat, season with salt and pepper, stir in the blue cheese, and serve.

title: New York Cheesecake
description: The iconic American dessert, so delectable you`ll want to eat the entire cake.
directions: Preheat your oven to 350° F.Grease a 9-inch springform pan.
Mix Graham cracker crumbs with your melted butter and CannaButter. Press the mixture to the bottom of the springform pan.

In a different bowl, mix cream cheese with sugar until smooth. Blend in the milk, then mix in the eggs one at a time. Add the sour cream, vanilla, and flour, then mix until smooth. Pour the filling into the prepared crust.
Bake for about 60 minutes. Turn the oven off, remove from oven, and let it cool for 5-6 hours to prevent cracking. Place in a refrigerator to chill.
Serve and enjoy!

title: Oats & Coconut Icebox Cookies
description: Classic oatmeal cookie recipe taken to the next level. The addition of shredded coconut and chopped walnuts really turn this recipe up a notch.
directions: Cream CannaButter, shortening and sugars until light and fluffy, 5-7 minutes.Beat in eggs and vanilla.
In another bowl, whisk CannaFlour, baking soda and salt; gradually beat into creamed mixture. Stir in oats, coconut and walnuts.
Divide dough in half. Shape each half into a 10-inch long roll. Wrap and refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 375°F.
Unwrap and cut dough crosswise into ½-inch slices. Place 2 inches apart on an ungreased baking sheets.
Bake until edges begin to brown, 8-10 minutes.
Cool 2 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.

title: Old-Fashioned Strawberry Shortcake
description: Sweet cannabis-infused strawberry shortcake, topped with whipped cream and fresh strawberries.
directions: Combine strawberries with sugar and vanilla; mash slightly.Let stand at least 30 minutes, tossing occasionally.
Preheat oven to 400° F.Whisk together CannaFlour, 4 tbsp sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
Cut in CannaButter until crumbly. Add buttermilk; stir until just combined.
Drop batter onto uncreased baking sheet in ⅓ cup scoops, about 2 inches apart.
Brush with 2 tbsp heavy cream; sprinkle with remaining 1 tbsp sugar.
Bake until golden, 18-20 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool completely.
Beat heavy whipping cream until it begins to thicken. Add sugar and vanilla; beat until soft peaks form.
To serve, cut shortcakes in half; top with strawberries and whipped cream.

title: PB & J Breakfast Grits
description: Experience the best of two American classics with this unique dish.
directions:
In a medium pot, whisk together the cannabis-infused coconut oil, almond milk, water, half the peanut butter, agave, and cinnamon until smooth and fully combined.

(optional) - Replace almond milk with cannabis-infused almond milk or CannaMilk.

Bring to a boil.

(note) - Keep a close eye on the pot when it is close to boiling.
Once boiling, whisk in the grits and reduce the heat to medium-low. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Once the grits have began to thicken up, whisk in the jam and remaining peanut butter. Remove from heat, cover, and let chill for about 5 minutes.
Top with remaining jam and optional bananas, agave, and cinnamon.

title: Peach Cobbler
description: The American south has always been known for their cobbler. Pair with some CannaMilk to really get lifted.
directions: Preheat oven to 375° F.
Pour melted CannaButter into a 9 x 13 inch baking dish.

Mix CannaFlour, 1 cup of the granulated sugar, baking powder and salt together. Add CannaMilk and egg. Stir until all dry ingredients are moistened.

(note) - Do not over stir.
Pour mixture evenly over the melted CannaButter. Let sit, do not stir.
Combine peaches, spices, brown sugar and remaining granulated sugar into saucepan over high heat.
Stir constantly while waiting for the peach mixture to boil.
Pour the hot peaches into the baking dish evenly over the batter and melted CannaButter. Do not stir.
Bake for 45 minutes in preheated oven. Cobbler is ready when batter rises and is golden brown.

title: Peanut Butter
description: This versatile spread is great for pairing with many other foods. If peanuts are not your favorite, replace them with nut of choice.
directions: Heat the oven to 250° F.
Grind up cannabis and put it in an ovenproof bowl with the coconut oil. Cover the bowl with foil and place it in the oven for 35 minutes.
Remove the bowl from the oven and using cheesecloth, strain the oil to rid it of the plant matter.
Add the cannabis-infused coconut oil to a food processor along with the nuts, stevia and salt. Process for 4-5 minutes until smooth.
Put your cannabis-infused peanut butter in a sealed container and store it in the fridge, or immediately spread it on a slice of bread and enjoy!

title: Peanut Butter CannaFudge
description: Liven up your CannaFudge with some nut butter. Your taste buds will thank you for the sweet and salty combo.
directions: Grease an 8 x 8 inch baking pan.
In a saucepan bring to a boil the sugar and CannaMilk. Let boil for 2 minutes, stirring often.
Remove from heat. Add the peanut butter and vanilla and mix until smooth.

Pour into a pan and let cool. Slice into 24 equal sized squares.

(optional) - Top fudge with marshmallows.

title: Peanut Butter Cups
description: When chocolate, cannabis, and peanut butter come together, great things happen.
directions: Prepare a cupcake tin with 6 liners.

Melt the CannaButter over a bain marie.

(bain marie- Place CannaButter in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.
Once the CannaButter has melted, sieve in the cocoa powder & 6 tbsp of powdered sugar.
Stir on low heat until the ingredients have completely mixed together. Mix thoroughly until there is consistency. Turn the heat off but leave the pot on the stove.
In a separate bowl, stir all of the peanut butter and powdered sugar together until smooth.
Spread 1 tbsp of the cannabis chocolate mixture in the bottom of each cupcake liner.
Dollop 2 tsp of the peanut butter mixture on top of the chocolate. Cover each dollop of peanut butter with 1 more tbsp of chocolate and smooth out the top.
Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chocolate has hardened. Remove peanut butter cups from the liners & enjoy!

title: Peanut Butter No Bake Bars
description: If you are pressed for time or just do not want to bake, this is your recipe.
directions: Mix all ingredients, except chocolate chips.Beat until thoroughly mixed and crumbly.Press into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan.

Melt the chocolate chips over a bain marie.

(bain marie- Place chocolate chips in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.
Spread melted chocolate evenly over graham mixture. Let Stand until chocolate hardens. Cut into small squares.
To store, place in a sealed container.

title: Pesto Macaroni and Cheese
description: Mac and Cheese that will have you coming back for more.
directions: Heat the oven to broil.
Melt half of unsalted butter in medium saucepan over medium heat and grill asparagus till tender. Add cremini mushrooms roughly 3 minutes prior to fully cooked asparagus. Set aside.
In a food processor, combine the spinach, parsley, basil, Parmesan, and garlic and purée until chunky. Add ½ cup milk and purée until smooth.
Melt the butter in another medium saucepan over medium heat; add the flour and cook 2 minutes.
Add remaining 3 cups milk and cook until thick, stirring occasionally, about 8-10 minutes.
Stir in half of the cheddar cheese, salt, and pepper and cook until the cheese has melted.
Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes.
Drain pasta, transfer to cheese sauce along with the asparagus, cremini mushrooms, spinach and herb blend and stir well to coat.
Spread pasta in a 9 x 13 inch baking dish and top with remaining cheese. Transfer baking dish to a baking sheet and broil until macaroni and cheese is golden brown and bubbly, about 5-7 minutes.
Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.

title: Pickles
description: Whether on a sandwich, in a dish, or à la carte, cannabis-infused pickles are a must have for the kitchen.
directions: Tightly pack the cucumbers, garlic cloves, mustard seeds, and fresh dill into a medium sized, heat-safe glass jar(about 32 oz).
In a small pot, bring the vinegar, water, salt and sugar to a boil over medium-high heat.
Pour the brine over the cucumbers and then seal the jar.
Refrigerate for at least 2 days before opening.

title: Pot Buttered Rum
description: A warm, sweet, and spicy adult beverage perfect for a cold rainy day.
directions: Bring water, CannaButter, unsalted butter, sugar, spices and salt to a boil in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in the rum.
Serve hot.

title: Pot Pastelitos
description: Simple and tasty puff pastries, perfect for picnics or parties.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 ºF and grease a cookie sheet.
Cut the puff pastry sheet into nine squares. Place about 1 tsp each of the filling and cannabis-infused honey on the middle of each square.
Fold square from a corner so it resembles a triangle. Press around the open edges with the end of a fork to seal each pastry.
Place the triangle onto a cookie sheet. Brush each pastry with simple syrup and place in the oven for 20-30 minutes.

title: Pot Toddy
description: Calm your mind and body with this relaxing adult beverage.
directions: Boil the water.
Steep the tea bags in the water for 5 minutes.
Remove the tea bags and add the rum, lemon juice, cannabis-infused honey and stir to combine.
Divide into four mugs and serve immediately.

title: Potato Chips
description: The best movie night treat, other than cannabis-infused Caramel Popcorn.
directions: Preheat your oven to 240° F and put your ground cannabis in an ovenproof bowl.
Add the coconut oil to the bowl over the cannabis and place it in the oven for 30 minutes to decarboxylate.

Remove the cannabis-infused coconut oil from the oven and strain using a sieve lined with cheesecloth to rid it of plant matter. Set the strained cannabis-infused coconut oil aside.

(note) - You can use melted CannaButter for this as well.
Fill another bowl with ice cold water and stir in salt.
Peel your potatoes, then slice them into paper-thin pieces using a mandoline slicer. Add the potato slices into the bowl of salty water as you cut and let them soak for 30 minutes.
Drain the water from the potatoes, place the slices on paper towels and pat them to dry.

Put the potatoes back into the bowl and drizzle the cannabis-infused coconut oil over them, along with the pepper and garlic powder. Mix with your hands to make sure all the potato slices are covered in the oil and spices.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and arrange the potato slices on it. Bake in the oven at 400°F for 15 minutes, until it`s crisp and golden brown.
Remove your cannabis-infused potato chips from the oven and allow to cool before serving.

title: Pumpkin Spiced Pancakes
description: If you enjoy pumpkin spice lattes, then these pancakes are just for you!
directions: Add soy milk and lemon juice into a small bowl and whisk together until combined.Let mixture sit for about 5 minutes.
Meanwhile in a medium bowl add the whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, spices, and salt. Whisk together to fully combine. Set aside.
Mash the bananas in a large bowl, taking care to leave a few lumps. Add the CannaOil, agave nectar, vanilla extract, and soy milk mixture. Whisk together until combined. Set aside.

Place a large skillet over medium heat. Slowly add the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until just combined.

(note) - Make sure there are no dry ingredient lumps in the batter.

Once skillet is heated, lightly butter the skillet and ladle the pancake batter on the skillet. Cook each pancake until golden brown on each side-about 5 minutes.

(note) - Place finished pancakes in a warm oven until ready to eat.

title: Quinoa Corn Cannabis Muffins
description: A healthy alternative to other muffins with the added benefit of getting you medicated.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 ºF and grease muffin tin.

Combine whole wheat flour, quinoa flour, salt, baking soda, and sugar in a medium mixing bowl.

(optional) - Replace whole wheat flour with CannaFlour.
In another medium bowl, mix the egg, CannaButter, yogurt and vanilla.
Stir the wet mixture into the dry mixture, then add the cooked quinoa and corn.

Spoon the batter into the muffin tin and bake for about 25 minutes.

(note) - Insert a toothpick to the middle of a muffin. If the toothpick comes out mostly clean and the muffins look golden brown, then they are ready!

title: Raw Vegan Energy Balls
description: For the vegan on the go, who must also maintain their medicinal needs.
directions: Place a small handful of cashews in a food processor and pulse until ground.Set aside.

Place sunflower seeds and the remaining cashews in the food processor and pulse until coarsely ground. Add the dates and pulse until well combined with the nuts and seeds. Add the syrup, almond butter, vanilla extract and salt. Process until the mixture is smooth.
Now add the cannabis-infused coconut oil and process until the mixture is smooth.

Form the mixture into golf-ball sized balls with your hands.

(note) - If you find the mixture to be too sticky, use the ground cashews set aside earlier and add small amounts until the mixture becomes more dough-like.
Roll the balls in an optional topping or leave plain, then place in the freezer until firm.

title: Red Velvet Pancakes
description: Change how you wake and bake with this amazing pancake recipe.
directions: In a small bowl, combine milk, egg, and butter; whisk thoroughly.
In another bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking soda, and salt; mix well.
Add liquid mixture to dry mix, and whisk together until all of the ingredients are just combined, leaving the batter slightly lumpy.
Heat your pan over medium heat for 60-90 seconds.
Butter the pan, then pour about ¼ cup batter for each pancake.
Cook for about 2 minutes or until edges set up, and the top is bubbly.
Carefully flip the pancake, and cook for another 1-2 minutes to cook the pancake through.
Repeat with rest of the batter.
Dust the pancakes with powdered sugar, and serve with your favorite syrups and toppings.

title: Ribeye with Chimichurri Sauce
description: Become a grilling legend with this succulent and spicy steak recipe.
directions:
In a large bowl mix parsley, garlic, red chili flakes, oregano, red wine vinegar, salt, and oils.

(optional) - Add diced cannabis leaves to mixture.
Rub the steaks with generous amount of salt and pepper. Let rest in fridge uncovered for 10 hours or overnight. Take out of fridge 2 hours before cooking and allow to come to room temp.

In a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, warm the remaining ¾ olive oil. Working with one ribeye at a time, cook, flipping once, until well browned and cooked to desired doneness.

(note) - The timing will depend on the thickness of the steak.
Transfer ribeye to a cutting board and let rest for 10 minutes. Repeat with remaining steak.
Cut steaks against the grain into slices about ½ inch thick and transfer to individual plates. Serve topped with CannaButter and accompanied by the chimichurri sauce.

title: Salted Peanut Butter Cup Milkshake
description: A cannabis-infused milkshake with peanut butter and chocolate … could it get any better?
directions: Blend all ingredients except the sea salt until smooth.
To serve, pour in a large glass and sprinkle with a pinch of sea salt.

title: Shellfish Curry
description: Spice up your seafood recipe with this cannabis-infused curry dish.
directions: Melt the cannabis-infused coconut oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the crab or lobster and cook slightly, about 2 minutes.
Stir in the curry powder and garlic, then add the granulated onion, and cayenne.
Stir in the coconut milk and chicken broth and reduce slightly, about 3 minutes.
Season to taste with salt and serve.

title: Skillet Herb Bread
description: Fluffy cornbread mixed with savory spices and infused with cannabis.
directions: In a large bowl, combine the CannaFlour, CannaSugar, baking powder, salt, sage and thyme.
Combine cornmeal, celery, onion and pimientos. Add mixture to dry ingredients and mix well.
Add eggs, milk and oil; stir just until moistened.
Pour into a greased 10-inch ovenproof skillet. Bake at 400°F for 35-45 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Serve warm.

title: Spicy Sardine Spaghetti
description: A classic too good to pass up. Enjoy the distinct flavors only sardines can deliver, while basking in the feelings only cannabis can give you.
directions: Heat 3 tbsp cannabis-infused olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat.
Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add the fennel and sardines and cook until the fennel is soft, about 4 minutes. Add the chili flakes and cook 1 minute more.
Add the white wine and cook until reduced slightly, about 2 minutes. Add the tomatoes and cook until slightly thick, 3-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and keep warm.
Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes.
Drain, reserving ½ cup pasta water. Toss the pasta in the sauce and season with salt and pepper.\n\n(note) - Add a bit of cooking liquid if needed to thin it out slightly.
Divide among bowls and top each with a dollop of ricotta. Drizzle with cannabis-infused olive oil to serve and garnish with the fennel fronds.

title: Spinach Cannabis Quiche
description: A delicious vegetarian meal and healthy way to ingest your medicine.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 ºF.
In a medium size skillet melt CannaButter over medium-heat. Add the garlic and onion to the skillet, cook for 5-6 minutes.
After about 5 minutes, add the mushrooms and spinach. Now add the feta cheese and ½ cup of shredded cheddar cheese.
Season with salt and black pepper. Stir well to combine until all of the cheese is mostly melted.
Spoon the quiche mixture into the unbaked pie crust.

In a medium bowl, beat the 4 eggs and 1 cup of milk. Pour egg mixture over the top of the spinach filling in the pie crust.

(note) - Jiggle the pie crust around to ensure that the quiche has no air bubbles.
Bake the quiche in the oven for 15 minutes. Remove the quiche from the oven and top it with the remaining ½ cup of cheddar cheese.

Bake the quiche for an additional 35-40 minutes.

(note) - Make sure the center of the quiche is completely set.
Remove the quiche from the oven and allow it to stand for 10 minutes.

title: Strawberry Cobbler
description: Savor the sweet taste of strawberries with every bite. This cobbler with leave you highly satisfied.
directions: In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside when evenly combined.
In a different large bowl, beat together CannaButter, sugar, and vanilla using a hand mixer or standing mixer. Mix until smooth.
Combine dry ingredients to CannaButter and sugar mixture. Slowly mix until mixture consists of pea sized crumbles.
In a 9 x 13 inch baking pan, layer the sliced strawberries. Add crumbled dough evenly across the top of the berries.
Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30 minutes until golden brown.

title: Strawberry Gin Smash
description: For those who like fruity alcoholic beverages, but still want to get lifted. Get the best of both worlds with every sip.
directions: Preheat oven to 240° F.Grind up cannabis and place into small ovenproof bowl and cover with foil.
Place the bowl in the oven for 30 minutes then remove and transfer the baked cannabis to mason jar.
Pour some gin into the jar until the cannabis is covered and soaked, seal the jar and shake for 60 seconds.

Fill a crock-pot with water until about ¼ full, set it on low and place the jar in the crock-pot. Allow the cannabis-gin mixture to infuse in the crock-pot for 8 hours.

(note) - Open the jar every hour to release pressure.
Next, line a funnel with cheesecloth and place it over a blender. Remove the cannabis-infused gin jar from the crock-pot and poor contents through the funnel into the blender.
Add a cup of ice cold water, strawberries, lemon juice, sugar, and salt to the blender. Blend until smooth, serve in a glass with a kiwi wedge and enjoy!

title: Strawberry Jam
description: Step up your peanut butter and jelly game with this tasty classic.
directions: In a wide bowl, crush strawberries in batches until you have 4 cups of mashed berry.
In a large saucepan, mix together the strawberries, sugar, CannaSugar, and lemon juice.

Process in a water bath.

(note) - If the jam is not going to be eaten right away, don`t bother with processing, and just refrigerate.

Stir over low heat until the sugar is dissolved. Increase heat to high and bring the mixture to a full rolling boil. Boil, stirring often, until the mixture reaches 220°F. Transfer to hot sterile jars, leaving ¼-½ inch headspace, and seal.
Stir before serving.

title: Strawberry Milkshake
description: Show your local diner how to make a proper milkshake with this innovative twist.
directions: Preheat your oven to 245° F and line a baking sheet with foil.
Grind your cannabis onto the baking sheet and bake it for 20-25 minutes.
After the cannabis is done baking, remove it from the oven and set it aside.

Put a saucepan on the stove over medium heat, pour in 2 cups of milk, add in the cannabis and let it simmer for 40 minutes while whisking occasionally.

(note) - Be careful not to boil as it will degrade the potency of your cannabis mixture.
Strain the CannaMilk into a jar using a colander lined with cheesecloth. Discard the plant matter and store in the fridge to cool.
Add the coconut milk, CannaMilk, ice cream, bananas, strawberries, maple syrup and vanilla, and blend until smooth.
Pour your milkshake into a mason jar and store in the fridge for several hours until it`s chilled and creamy.

title: Strawberry Vinaigrette
description: A sweet, healthy alternative to other salad dressings. This dressing is infused with cannabis coconut oil.
directions: In a small container, add the strawberry puree, white balsamic vinegar, honey, and black pepper. Blend with an immersion blender.
While the blender continues to run, slowly drizzle in the cannabis-infused coconut oil until well incorporated.
Set aside or store in refrigerator.

title: Strawberry Vinaigrette with Burrata Salad
description: Fresh arugula tossed with strawberries, slivered almonds, burrata cheese, and cannabis-infused strawberry vinaigrette.
directions: Evenly divide the arugula, strawberries, and almonds amongst 4 large salad bowls.
Top each salad with a burrata cheese ball.
In a small container, add the strawberry puree, white balsamic vinegar, honey, and black pepper. Blend with an immersion blender.
While the blender continues to run, slowly drizzle in the cannabis-infused coconut oil until well incorporated.
Drizzle 2½ oz of the Infused Strawberry Vinaigrette per salad.
Toss if desired, top with freshly ground black pepper, and enjoy.
Serve immediately.

title: Summer Berry Cobbler
description: You can`t go wrong with cobbler. This is the perfect dish for your next summer party.
directions: In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt.Set aside when evenly combined.
In a large bowl, beat together CannaButter, sugar, and vanilla using hand mixer or standing mixer. Mix until smooth.
Combine dry ingredients to CannaButter and sugar mixture. Slowly mix until mixture consists of pea sized crumbles.
In a 9 x 13 inch baking pan, layer mixed berries. Add crumbled dough evenly across the top of the berries.
Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30 minutes until golden brown.

title: Super Green Smoothie
description: For the vegans or any other healthy individuals who want to also enjoy their cannabis.
directions: Place all ingredients inside a blender or food processor.
Blend until thick and smooth consistency is reached.
Serve immediately.

title: The Dude Abides
description: Abide to the recipe prescribed by the Dude. Enjoy the creamy coffee flavor of this cannabis-infused cocktail.
directions: In a medium saucepan, stir together the coffee, CannaCream, Kahlua and vodka over medium heat until thoroughly warmed.
Divide among four mugs and serve immediately.

title: Toffee No Bake Cookies
description: Looking for a quick and easy treat? These no bake cookies will be your best friend.
directions: Line a baking sheet with wax paper.
Combine the oats, peanut butter, chocolate chips, toffee bits, CannaButter and salt in a medium saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until the chocolate chips melt.
Scoop large spoonfuls of batter onto the baking sheet and sprinkle each cookie with extra toffee bits.

Freeze for 15 minutes before serving.

(note) - The cookies can be stored in the refrigerator in an air-tight container for 1 week.
Serve once the cookies have cooled.

title: Tomahawk Rib Eye
description: Take a bite into the Old West with this cowboy favorite. Pairs great with wedge cut potatoes and a tall beer.
directions: First, the garlic herb CannaButter must be created.In a food processor, bring 1 cup CannaButter to room temperature and blend in the parsley, sea salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder.
Once the butter is thoroughly blended, transfer it to a piece of parchment paper or plastic wrap. Roll the butter into a log and wrap it tightly.
Put it in a freezer zip-top bag before storing it in the fridge or freezer.
Put a 12-inch cast-iron skillet in the oven and preheat the oven to 500°F.
Rub the steak with the canola oil and season it generously with salt and pepper.

Wearing an oven mitt, carefully remove the hot skillet from the oven and put it on the stove over high heat. Put the steak in the pan and sear it for 1 minute, then turn it and sear on the other side for 1 minute. Flip the steak and carefully return the pan to the oven.

Cook the steak for 3 minutes, flip it and cook for an additional 3 minutes, or until an instant-read thermometer reads 140°F. Remove it from the oven and let it rest, tented with aluminum foil, for 10 minutes.
Slice meat off the bone and cut into thick slices. Top with your homemade garlic herb CannaButter.

title: Vanilla Ice Cream
description: One of CannaBook`s most popular recipes. Enjoy this classic ice cream recipe as is, or change things up by adding your favorite ingredients.
directions: Whip the cream till stiff.
Add all remaining ingredients in a separate bowl and mix. Now fold the mixture with the whipping cream.
Store in a container and freeze for 6 hours.
Serve while cold.

title: Vegan Banana Bread
description: Vegan cannabis-infused batter mixed with banana and chopped walnuts, topped with toasted walnuts.
directions: Preheat oven to 350° F.
Start by making the flax eggs: stir flaxseed meal and water together then set aside for 5-10 minutes or until the flaxseed has absorbed the water.
Next, use a fork to mash the bananas into the bottom of a bowl.
In a separate bowl, cream butter and CannaSugar together. Next, add the bananas, vanilla and flax eggs.
Add the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt to the same bowl and stir to combine, then stir in ½ cup chopped walnuts.
Grease a bread pan with coconut oil, then pour batter into the pan. Sprinkle the remaining ¼ cup chopped walnuts evenly on top of the batter.
Bake bread for 50-55 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Let the bread cool for 10 minutes before running a knife along the edges, then carefully inverting the bread onto a cooling rack.
Wait until bread cools completely before slicing.

title: Vegan Macaroni and Cheese
description: Enjoy this vegan dish packed with flavor. Pairs great with a salad and your favorite berry juice.
directions: Heat a large pot on low heat.Add butter and chopped garlic.As the butter is melting, whisk in the nutritional yeast, garlic powder and salt.Incorporate the dry ingredients with the butter, then quickly add in a few tablespoons of almond milk.Alternate, mixing in small amounts of vegan cheese and almond milk, until it is all blended together into a sauce, then mix in the mustard.

Once you have mixed the mustard thoroughly into the sauce, switch to using a rubber spatula and mix in the cooked pasta, cannabis-infused oil and pasta water, mixing to coat.

(note) - It is fine if you still have some unmelted vegan cheese shreds.This is due to some vegan cheeses not melting quickly.
Salt and pepper to taste. If your pasta is too runny, add more nutritional yeast.
If you want to dose the whole batch with THC, you can add in the cannabis oil at this point and mix it thoroughly. Or you can let your guests add a drizzle on top of their plates individually.
Cover the pot and remove from heat. Put it aside.

Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet on medium-high. Once hot, toss in the jackfruit. Cook until any excess moisture is cooked out and the edges get crispy. Add salt and pepper to taste, then remove from heat.
Mix together the jackfruit and the barbecue sauce. Place the skillet under the broiler, handle out, on high. Keep a close eye on your pan and make sure nothing burns.

To serve, scoop in a half-cup of macaroni, then add a few tablespoons of jackfruit.

(optional) - Add hot sauce if desired and top with scallions and cilantro.

title: Vegan Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: These cannabis-infused oatmeal cookies go great with some cannabis-infused coffee or almond milk.
directions: Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat to 375 ºF.Line two large cookie sheets with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, whisk together the maple syrup, cannabis-infused coconut oil, and vanilla extract until smooth and combined.
Sift in the oat flour, CannaFlour, baking soda, and salt, then stir to combine. Stir in the oats and chopped chocolate.
Scoop 1-inch diameter balls of dough (about 3 tbsp) onto the prepared baking sheets, spaced 2-3 inches apart. Top each cookie with a chunk or two of chocolate and a tiny pinch of flaky salt.
Bake the trays one at a time, rotating halfway through for even baking, about 8-10 minutes.
Slide the cookies, parchment and all, off of the cookie sheet and onto the cooling rack to stop the baking.

Repeat with the remaining cookies.

(note) - The finished cookies will keep stored in an airtight container for up to 3 days.

title: Very Berry Frozen Cheesecake Pops
description: Perfect for a hot day! Enjoy these amazing popsicles throughout this hot summer. Stay cool while you medicate.
directions: In a medium mixing bowl, use an electric mixer to beat cream cheese until light and fluffy. Lower mixer speed and mix in yogurt, agave syrup, and lemon or lime juice, and kief until thoroughly combined.
Turn off mixer and use a rubber spatula to fold the berries into the mixture. Divide mixture among ice pop molds and freeze.
When ready to eat, run hot water over the mold for about 10 seconds, the popsicles should easily pull right out of the mold.

title: Weed Whiskey
description: Enjoy this cannabis-infusion in cocktails or take shots. Just be careful, this infusion will creep up on you.
directions: Preheat the oven to 240 ºF.

Decarboxylate your cannabis by spreading it evenly across a cookie sheet. Place aluminum foil over the top of the cannabis.

(note) - Break your cannabis up in to relatively small chunks to help the decarboxylation process.
Place tray into the oven for 25-45 minutes. Take it out and let it cool.
Grind the cannabis and wrap it in cheesecloth.
Place the cheesecloth package in a 1 L sealable jar, then add the whiskey.

Shake the bottle and let it sit, in the dark, for at least 48 hours. Shake it up at least once a day until it has reached your desired potency—up to one month, if possible.

(note) - The longer it sits, the more potent it will be.

Pour the whiskey mixture into a glass container, using a cheesecloth to strain out any ground cannabis from the whiskey.

(note) - Discard the plant material.
Store in 1 L sealable jar.

title: Whipped CannaCream
description: Light, airy, cannabis-infused whipped cream with hints of vanilla.
directions: Heat heavy cream and ground cannabis in double boiler over medium heat.
Simmer for at least 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Remove the boiler from the heat and let the mixture cool.
Prepare a storage container by taking 2 sheets of the cheese cloth and securing it over the lid of the container.
Pour the cream slowly over the top of the cheesecloth and into the container.
After a few minutes pour the cream into an airtight container and store in the refrigerator until cold.

Pour the cold cream into a large bowl.

(note) - Whip the cream until it is thick enough for your tastes.

Beat in the vanilla extract and sugar gently.

(note) - Over-beating will result in lumpy whipped cream.
Serve and enjoy. Keep refrigerated.

title: Wild Rice Bread with Sunflower Seeds
description: Fluffy loaves of cannabis-infused bread with sweet honey and flaxseed, topped with flaxseed and toasted wheat germ.
directions: In a small bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water.

In a large bowl, combine rice, 1 cup sunflower kernels, milk, honey, CannaButter, flaxseed, salt, yeast mixture, whole wheat flour and 1 cup CannaFlour; beat on medium speed until combined. Stir in enough remaining flour to form a stiff dough (dough will be sticky).
Turn dough onto a floured surface; knead until elastic, 6-8 minutes. Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease the top. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 75 minutes.
Punch down dough. Turn onto a lightly floured surface; divide in half. Roll each half into a 12 x 8 inch rectangle.
Roll up jelly-roll style, starting with a short side; pinch seam and ends to seal. Place each in a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan coated with cooking spray, seam side down.
Cover with kitchen towels; let rise in a warm place until almost doubled, about 45 minutes. Preheat oven to 375°F.

Brush loaves with egg white; sprinkle with remaining sunflower kernels.

(optional) - Sprinkle wheat germ if desired.
Bake 35-45 minutes or until dark golden brown. Cool in pans 5 minutes. Remove to a wire rack to cool.
